NCCP

2011 Senior National Judo Championships
Edmonton, Alberta, May 21-22, 2011

      It was a good weekend with a lot of strong performances from the team. The team had great spirit and all of the Saskatchewan athletes fought well.

      Here are the individual results:
        Senior Men
        -66kg Warren Seib, Watrous, 7th place
        -81kg Ian McDonald, Lloydminster, 5th place
        -90kg Sean Morrison, Lloydminster, 9th place

        Senior Women
        -52kg Jordan Poliakiwski, Lloydminster, 5th place
        -57kg Alex Poliakiwski, Lloydminster, 7th place
        -63kg Emily Schaan, Watrous, 5th place
        -70kg Nicole Dyck, Watrous, 7th place
        -78kg Chelys Vallejo, Prince Albert, 9th place
        -78kg Bishop Sommerfled, Regina YMCA, 3rd place
        +78kg Christen Chambers, Lloydminster, 3rd place

        Veterans
        -78kg Chelys Vallejo, Prince Albert, DNP
        -81kg Blair Taylor, Prince Albert, DNP
        -81kg Mike Horvey, Senshudokan Regina, 1st place
        -90kg Robb Karaim, Senshudokan Regina, 2nd place
        -100kg Kim Schau, Saskatoon YMCA, 2nd place

        Kata
        Blair Doige & Pat Pattison, Saskatoon YMCA, 2nd Nage No Kata and 3rd Katame No Kata
